alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 10:00AM EDT until August 18 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NORFOLK...CENTRAL SUFFOLK AND NORTHWESTERN PLYMOUTH COUNTIES... At 1000 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hull, or near Quincy, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Boston, Quincy, Weymouth, Revere, Braintree, Chelsea, Randolph, Milton, Hingham, Scituate, Winthrop, Rockland, Abington, Hanover, Holbrook, Norwell, Hull, and Cohasset. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
